com.brashmonkey.spriter

Class Calculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brashmonkey.spriter.Calculator

  • public class Calculator
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class which provides methods to calculate Spriter specific issues, like linear interpolation and rotation around a parent object. Other interpolation types are coming with the next releases of Spriter.
